entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as 'Harry Potter' multiple times. (Excerpt: 'Dobby will do it, Harry Potter!')

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A Hogwarts staff member, mentioned as being in her office and having a spell cast to prevent her from hearing the commotion. (Excerpt: 'glancing towards Madam Pomfrey’s office door')

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is bound to serve Harry's family, mentioned as being ashamed of his master. (Excerpt: 'Kreacher will do whatever Master wants')

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is eager to help Harry Potter and is willing to take on a task for him. (Excerpt: 'Dobby would be honoured to help Harry Potter!')

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A Hogwarts student mentioned as being the target of Harry's request to be tailed. (Excerpt: 'I want you to tail Draco Malfoy.')

relationships.description: Harry checks if Madam Pomfrey's office is still working, implying that she has an office. (Excerpt: 'glancing towards Madam Pomfrey’s office door')
Kreacher is bound to serve Harry's family, implying that Harry has a slave-like relationship with Kreacher. (Excerpt: 'Kreacher will do whatever Master wants')
Dobby is eager to help Harry and is willing to take on a task for him, implying that Dobby is a helper of Harry. (Excerpt: 'Dobby will do it, Harry Potter!')
Harry asks Kreacher and Dobby to tail Draco Malfoy, implying that Draco is the target of surveillance. (Excerpt: 'I want you to tail Draco Malfoy.')
